p: Bibliographical analysis of the publications (original research articles) related to Rn shows a significant increase in publications from the late 2000s onwards with 11 Rn related articles published in 2009, 70 articles in 2015 and 62 so far in 2020. These articles break down into the following subject areas; pharmacology and toxicology (19%), biochemistry, genetics and molecular biology (17%), agricultural and biological sciences (17%), chemistry (14%), medicine (13%), immunology (4%) and others (16%) (data obtained from SCOPUS).
